- *For the artifact weapon in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), see [Mirror Brand (dNetHack)](/wiki/Mirror_Brand_\(dNetHack\) "Mirror Brand (dNetHack)").*

**Mirror Brand** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"). It is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned"), and its base item is a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") made of [glass](/wiki/Glass "Glass").

## Generation

Mirror Brand can be given as a [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") to any role, though it will never be the first given.

## Description

While wielded, Mirror Brand grants [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection"). Versus monsters wielding weapons, Mirror Brand "reflects" that weapon and adds its dice as bonus damage. Mirror Brand can be [twoweaponed](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon") with [Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand") or [Frost Brand](/wiki/Frost_Brand "Frost Brand"), and vice versa.
